all: We do not have any stats for this player.

bio: > Started playing tennis at age 7 when aunt introduced him to the sport.
> Father, Taek-gwang, is a golf instructor; mother, Kang-ju, is a housewife; brother, Min-hwan, is also a tennis player.
> Favourite surface is grass and tournament is Wimbledon.
> Favourite shot is big forehand after a serve.
> Idol growing up was Roger Federer.
> Hobbies include watching movies and listening to music (hip-hop – Eminem).
> Favourite sports team is Real Madrid and favourite athlete is Cristiano Ronaldo.
